content: next single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet* repeat to end of round 24 single_crochet round 5 *increase in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet* repeat to end of round 30 single_crochet rounds 6-15 single_crochet in each single_crochet around round 16 *decrease single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet* repeat to end of round 24 single_crochet stuff body allowing for a small amount of stuffing to be pushed in before tying off round 17 *decrease single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet* repeat to end of round 18 single_crochet round 18 *decrease single_crochet in next single_crochet* repeat to end of round 12 single_crochet stuff remainder of body to gain shape but do not over stuff fasten_off with slip_stitch and weave end through remaining 12 single_crochet and pull tight sew in end sew head to body ensuring that head is securely attached weave in any ends your doll should look something like fig 1 below fig 1 arms make 2 chain 2 round 1 make 6 single_crochet into 2nd chain from hook 6 single_crochet round 2 2 single_crochet in every single_crochet around 12 single_crochet round 3 *increase in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet* repeat to end of round rounds 4 7 single_crochet in every single_crochet around round 8 single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet *single_crochet treble_crochet single_crochet* in next stitch single_crochet in every single_crochet to end of round round 9 single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet skip over treble_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet and every single_crochet to end of round stuff hand lightly so that it has some definition but isn t fat round 10 decrease twice pull up loop through next single_crochet skip double_crochet and pull up loop in next single_crochet yarn over hook and draw through all 3 loops on hook decrease around to last stitch single_crochet in last single_crochet 10 single_crochet round 11 - 13 single_crochet in every single_crochet around fasten_off with slip_stitch sew end of arm together flat and attach to body at the neck thumbs facing upward fig 2 fig 3 legs make 2 chain 2 round 1 make 6 single_crochet into 2nd chain from hook 6 single_crochet round 2 increase in every single_crochet round 12 single_crochet round 3 *increase in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet* 18 single_crochet round 4 single_crochet in every single_crochet to end of round round 5 - 7 single_crochet in every single_crochet but through both loops of single_crochet stuff round 8 *draw loop up through next and following single_crochet 3 loops on hook yoh pull yarn through all 3 loops 1 loop on hook * repeat * 5 times single_crochet in each single_crochet to end of round round 9 *draw loop up through next and following single_crochet 3 loops on hook yoh pull yarn through all 3 loops 1 loop on hook * repeat 3 times single_crochet in each single_crochet to end of round 10 single_crochet rounds 10 14 single_crochet in each single_crochet to end of round fasten_off with slip_stitch sew top of leg flat see fig 4 and sew to base of body so that
